transcript.text:
￼














Store Setup

Store Configurations
Shipping Method

1 min
having a strong ecommerce shipping policy could streamline operations and make matters much simpler for your business customers seriously care about the cost of shipping, and they don’t want to pay a cent more than they have to in fact, shipping costs are widely regarded as the number one pet peeve amongst potential customers a shipping method is a service that a customer pays at the checkout for the delivery examples of a few shipping methods are – a fixed charge, like a $5 flat rate on all orders a rate based on package weight a dynamically calculated charge using a real time shipping quote from the carrier service provider
Did this page help you?
